meanings.definition: relating to or characteristic of government
meanings.sent1: The governmentally approved document was signed by the president.
meanings.sent2: The new law was passed by the governmentally appointed officials.
meanings.sent3: The governmentally mandated uniforms made everyone look like clones.
meanings.sent4: Her leadership style was described as governmentally strict.
meanings.sent5: The governmentally funded project aimed to improve public services.

meanings.definition: in a governmental manner or capacity
meanings.sent1: The mayor spoke governmentally during the press conference.
meanings.sent2: The committee members acted governmentally in their decision-making process.
meanings.sent3: She jokingly imitated a robot moving governmentally slow.
meanings.sent4: The information was shared governmentally, without any bias.
meanings.sent5: The team worked governmentally to ensure transparency in their actions.
